page.title: 05People and Work
page.content: We wanted to find out where people from Thurcroft worked.We asked 182 people to get these results. We found that 67% of our sample worked less than 5 miles from home.The journey to work was less than 10 minutes for 39% of them and between 10 and 30 minutes for 45%.We also asked them how they got to work.The answers were that 27% walked,40% used their own transport,24% used public transport and 9% of them used company transport. These figures told us that most people worked within the local area and had short journeys to work.A large number walked to work.These were mainly miners or people who worked within Thurcroft(for example school cleaners and kitchen staff,shop assistants and workers on the local industrial estate).
